content: clairière cowl this cowl is very easy and fast once you memorize the twisted stitch set which is easy too also this is reversible you can get two looks on one cowl nice finished size approx 11 3/4 30cm wide and 8 3/4 22cm length yarn malabrigo worsted 1 skein yellow or madelinetosh vintage 1 skein khaki or any yarn worsted weight could be substituted need approx 200yds 130m needle us size 8 5mm 16 circular or dpns set of 4 or 5 as you like notion stitch marker and darning needle gauge 24 sts =4 10cm in twisted stitch pattern twisted stitch pattern 3 sts x 4 row set row 1 and 2 *k1 p2 repeat from * throughout row 3 *right-twist rt see below first 2 sts p1 repeat from * throughout row 4 *k2 p1 repeat from * throughout rt knit first two stitches together on left hand needle then remaining these two sts on the lh needle knit into the first stitch alone again of these sts then drop both sts off from lh needle together see youtube right twist tutorial for better understanding http //youtu be/yck2ugpon_g pattern co 135 sts with long-tail co method put the marker and join without twist it starting row 1 repeat twisted stitch pattern set 4 row until 14 times you repeat row 3 in total continue until row 1 or until the garment attains to the desired length 14 times repeat depends on the length of 1 skein of worsted yarn bind off with ez s sewn bind off or the way you like ez s bobble makes the edge a bit ruffle but easy to stretch the ruffle should be unseen when you wear weave in two ends in the wrong side carefully hiding along the nearest straight st st-like vertical line which lies every 3 sts the more you weave in nicely and invisibly the more the reverse side looks another right side too ©tricoquelicot
